the_problem_text_P1: Each and every trade you submit through a DEX (Decentralized Exchange) is vulnerable to front-running and sandwich attacks – though the larger the transaction, the larger the risk of an attack.
the_problem_text_P2: To execute these attacks, front-runners monitor the publicly visible mempool (pending transactions) using bots that hunt for transactions to attack. Once a bot locks in on your transaction, it executes the front-running attack by slightly outbidding your gas fee, incentivizing the miner to validate the attacker’s transaction before yours.
the_problem_text_P3: Now that you’ve been cut in line by the attacker’s bots, their transaction gets executed before yours, leaving you with a worse exchange rate than you deserve.
our_solution_subtext_SEC2: front-running protection for transactions on the Ethereum network
skip_the_mempool: Skip the mempool - skip the risk
frontrun_protection_text_P: We keep your swap protected against front-running and sandwich attacks by sending them directly to validators through our secure network.
stop_leaving_money_on_the_table: Stop leaving money on the table
arbitrage_extraction_text_P: Our network communicates directly with whitehat MEV searchers who use your transactions to produce additional arbitrage profit that gets shared with you.
community_benefit_text_P: Reduce network congestion by eliminating the front-running and sandwich attacker’s incentive to flood the network with transactions and inflate gas fees.
fast_protect_text_P1: DexGuard protects your transactions from front-running and sandwich attacks by skipping the mempool entirely.
fast_protect_text_P2: Instead of executing your transactions using the peer-to-peer blockchain network like other DEXs, DexGuard securely sends your transaction directly to mining pools using our high-performance global network, thereby keeping your transaction hidden from front-running and sandwich bots until after it’s been mined and the window of opportunity for an attack has passed.
fast_protect_text_P3: To use Fast Protect outside of SushiSwap or UniSwap, make an account
paid_for_creating_arbitrage: Get Paid For Creating Arbitrage Opportunities
BackRunMe_text_P1: DexGuard automatically couples your transactions with whitehat MEV searchers who identify mutually beneficial arbitrage opportunities using your transaction and share the profits with you.
BackRunMe_text_P2: DexGuard increases information efficiency about token prices across exchanges by executing the arbitrage trades faster and sooner than a front-running or sandwich bot could.
deter_malicious_bot_behavior: Deter Malicious Bot Behavior On the Network
community_benefit_text_P1_SEC2: to front-running and sandwich bots – a 600% increase from the year before.
community_benefit_text_P2: DexGuard benefits the entire Ethereum network by reducing the incentive to operate front-running and sandwich bots.
community_benefit_text_P3: Fewer front-running and sandwich bots makes for a less congested network – less congestion means lower gas fees for everyone.
about_bloxroute_text_P1: DexGuard is a leading security solution that protects DEX platforms from vulnerabilities. Our advanced techniques, including code obfuscation and encryption, fortify the platforms against attacks and reverse engineering.
about_bloxroute_text_P2: With DexGuard, developers can confidently release applications, knowing their DEX platforms are safeguarded from potential threats. We continuously stay ahead of emerging vulnerabilities to provide cutting-edge security technology and ensure the integrity of your DEX platforms.
about_bloxroute_text_P3: Trust DexGuard to protect your applications from various vulnerabilities and focus on innovation.

and you agree to bloXroute Labs’
slippage_tolerance_tooltip: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.
transaction_deadline_tooltip: Your transaction will revert if it is pending for more than this period of time.
toggle_expert_mode_tooltip: Allow high price impact trades and skip the confirm screen. Use at your own risk.
disable_multihops_tooltip: Restricts swaps to direct pairs only.
are_you_sure_text: Expert mode turns off the confirm transaction prompt and allows high slippage trades that often result in bad rates and lost funds.
are_you_sure_text_alert: ONLY USE THIS MODE IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING.
turn_on_expert_mode_confirme: Please type the word “confirm” to enable expert mode.
common_bases_tooltip: These tokens are commonly paired with other tokens.
gas_price_tooltip: Price per gas unit in Gwei. Must be greater than competing gas prices within the specified transaction deadline or the transaction will not be processed.
gas_limit_tooltip: The maximum amount of gas units you are willing to spend on your transaction. Any unused ETH is returned to your wallet.
private_tx_fee_tooltip: bloXroute Private Transaction Fee is 15% of the estimated transaction fee.
estimated_cost_tooltip: Estimated cost for transaction fee. Transaction fee = gas price x gas limit.

toleranceExplanation: Lowering this limit decreases your risk of frontrunning. However, this makes more likely that your transaction will fail due to normal price movements.

rangeWarning: Your liquidity will only be active and earning fees when the rate of the pool is within this price range.
